mapper.select:
select pac.firstname as nome , pac.lastname as sobrenome , pac.gender__pc as genero , pac.personbirthdate as dataNascimento , pac.age__c as idade , pac.personmobilephone as telefone , pac.personemail as email , pac.cpf__c as cpf , pac.billingpostalcode as cep , pac.billingstreet as endereco , pac.row_id as idconnex
from process.account pac where pac.row_id = #{rowId}

select pac.modelname__c as modelo , pac.enginetype__c as motor , pac.latestmileage__c as transmissao , pac.x_license_plate__c as versao , pac.vehiclecolor__c as cor , pac.purchaseprice__c as preco from process.asset pac where pac.contact_row_id__c = #{rowId}

select (case when wants_loan__c = true then 'Sim' when wants_loan__c = false then 'Não' when wants_loan__c isnull then 'Não Informado' end) as querFinanciar , loan_type__c as tipoFinanciamento , down_payment__c as valorEntradaFinanciamento , installments_amt__c as qtdParcelaFinanciamento from process.service_request sr where sr.protocol__c = #{protocol} limit 1

select '0' as temperatureNum , (case when predictive_temp__c = 'Q' then 'Hot' when predictive_temp__c = 'M' then 'Warm' when predictive_temp__c = 'Z' then 'Not Classified' when predictive_temp__c = 'X' then 'Not Available' when predictive_temp__c = 'F' then 'Cold' end) as temperature from process.opportunity where protocol__c = #{protocol} union all select temperaturenumber__c as temperatureNum , (case when predictivetemp__c = 'Q' then 'Hot' when predictivetemp__c = 'M' then 'Warm' when predictivetemp__c = 'Z' then 'Not Classified' when predictivetemp__c = 'X' then 'Not Available' when predictivetemp__c = 'F' then 'Cold' end) as temperature FROM process.sales_consult_history where protocol__c = #{protocol} order by temperatureNum asc
select sch.temperaturenumber__c as tipoAgendamento , sch.description_interaction__c as dataAgendamento from process.sales_consult_history sch where protocol__c = #{protocol}

select interactionstartdate__c as firstInteractionDate , statussales__c as saleStatus , reason__c as reason , result__c as result , salespersoncode__c as saleCPF , dmsenddate__c as endDate , dmsreceivedate__c as dlrReceiveDate , dealerrespondetime__c as dlrResponseTime from process.sales_consult_history where protocol__c = #{protocol} order by interactionnumber__c desc limit 1

select interactionnumber__c as interactionNum , first_interaction_date__c as date , description_interaction__c as description , case when contact_flag__c = true then 'Y' else 'N' end as contactCustomer from process.sales_consult_history where protocol__c = #{protocol} order by interactionnumber__c asc

select usedcar_as_down_payment__c::varchar as usadoNaTroca , usedcar_brand__c as usadoMarca , usedcar_model__c as usadoModelo , usedcar_year__c as usadoAno , usedcar_km__c as usadoKM , usedcar_plate__c as usadoExpectativaValor , usedcar_color__c as usadoCor , payment_status__c as usadoPlaca , usedcar_chassi__c as usadoChassi , usedcar_version__c as usadoVersao , usedcar_min_price__c as usadoPrecoMin , usedcar_max_price__c as usadoPrecoMax , usedcar_mid_price__c as usadoPrecoMed from process.service_request where protocol__c = #{protocol} limit 1

select pa.personemail as CONTACT_EMAIL , po.protocol__c as PROTOCOL , po.statussales__c as STAGENAME , po.legacycreateddate__c as ASGN_DT , pa.personbirthdate as BIRTH_DT , pa.billingcity as CITY_CUST , po.closedate as CLOSE_DT , pa.row_id , pa."type" as CONTACT_TYPE , pd.dealercode__c as SALES_DLR_CODE , pd.corporaterepresentativename__c as SALES_DLR_NICK , pd.situationstatusreason__c , po.description as DESCRIPTION , pd.billingcity as DLR_CITY , pd.billingstate as STATUS_DEALER , po.form__c as FORM , pa.gender__pc as GENDER , po.level1__c as LEVEL1 , po.level2__c as LEVEL2 , po.level3__c as LEVEL3 , po.level4__c as LEVEL4 , po.medium_tag__c as MEDIUM_TAG , po.origin as ORIGIN , sr.quote_color__c as QUOTE_COLOR , sr.quote_color_price__c as QUOTE_COLOR_PRICE , sr.usedcar_max_price__c as QUOTE_FINAL_PRICE , sr.quotetransmission__c as QUOTE_TRANSMISSION , sr.quote_version_price__c as QUOTE_VERSION_PRICE , sr.version__c as QUOTE_VERSION , po.status as STAGENAME , po.dealercode__c as QUOTE_DEALER , po.reason__c as REASON , sr.relatedmodel__c as RELATED_MODEL , po.source_tag__c as SOURCE_TAG , pa.billingstate as STATE_CUST , (case when pa.blockedmobile__c = true then 'Y' else 'N' end) as SUP_CELPH , (case when pa.blockedemails__c = true then 'Y' else 'N' end) as SUP_EMAIL , (case when pa.blockedsms__c = true then 'Y' else 'N' end) as SUP_SMS , (case when pa.blockedvideocall__c = true then 'Y' else 'N' end) as SUP_VIDEOCALL , (case when pa.blockedwhatsapp__c = true then 'Y' else 'N' end) as SUP_WHATSAPP , po.campaign_tag__c as CAMPAIGN_TAG , po.row_id as rowId , po.legacycreateddate__c from process.opportunity po join process.account pa on po.contact_row_id__c = pa.row_id left join process.account pd on po.dealer__c = pd.row_id join process.service_request sr on po.protocol__c = sr.protocol__c where po.status = 'Distributed' and po.qexpertreceiveddate__c isnull and po.predictive_temp__c isnull and po.legacycreateddate__c >= to_timestamp((now()::date)::varchar||' 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:SS') - '1 days'::interval and po.legacycreateddate__c <= to_timestamp((now()::date)::varchar||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:SS')
